items.label: def-effective-counts-two-scales
items.title: Effective Interaction Counts (Two Scales)
items.content:
176: :label: def-effective-counts-two-scales
177: 
178: **1. Softmax Effective Companions** (scale $\varepsilon_c$):
179: $$
180: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}(i) := \left|\left\{\ell \in \mathcal{A} : d_{\text{alg}}(i,\ell) \leq R_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}\right\}\right|
181: $$
182: 
183: where:
184: $$
185: R_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)} = \varepsilon_c \sqrt{C_{\text{comp}}^2 + 2\log(k^2)}
186: $$
187: 
188: **Scaling**:
189: $$
190: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)}(i) = O(\rho_{\max} \cdot \varepsilon_c^{2d} \cdot (\log k)^d)
191: $$
192: 
193: **Properties**:
194: - Grows logarithmically with $k$
195: - NOT k-uniform
196: - Controls softmax companion sums over $\ell$
197: 
198: **2. Localization Effective Neighbors** (scale $\rho$):
199: $$
200: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) := \left|\left\{j \in \mathcal{A} : d_{\text{alg}}(i,j) \leq R_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}\right\}\right|
201: $$
202: 
203: where:
204: $$
205: R_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} = C_\rho \cdot \rho
206: $$
207: 
208: for some constant $C_\rho$ independent of $k$.
209: 
210: **Scaling**:
211: $$
212: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) = O(\rho_{\max} \cdot \rho^{2d})
213: $$
214: 
215: 
216: **Explicit bound**: The effective neighbor count satisfies:
217: $$
218: k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}(i) \leq C_{\text{vol}} \rho_{\max} \rho^{2d}
219: $$
220: 
221: where $C_{\text{vol}} = \pi^d / \Gamma(d+1)$ is the volume of the unit ball in $\mathbb{R}^{2d}$ (phase space).
222: **Properties**:
223: - Independent of $k$

items.label: def-reg-std-implementation
items.title: Regularized Standard Deviation (Implementation)
items.content:
2395: :::{prf:definition} Regularized Standard Deviation (Implementation)
2396: :label: def-reg-std-implementation
2397: $$
2398: \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V) = \sqrt{V + \sigma'^2_{\min}}
2399: $$
2400: 
2401: where $\sigma'_{\min} = \sqrt{\kappa_{\text{var,min}} + \varepsilon_{\text{std}}^2}$ with:
2402: - $\kappa_{\text{var,min}} > 0$: Variance floor threshold (typical value: $10^{-8}$ to $10^{-6}$)
2403: - $\varepsilon_{\text{std}} > 0$: Numerical stability parameter (typical value: $10^{-6}$ to $10^{-4}$)
2404: 
2405: **Derivative bounds:**
2406: $$
2407: \begin{align}
2408: L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \\
2409: L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{1}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \\
2410: L_{\sigma'''_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}}
2411: \end{align}
2412: $$
2413: 
2414: **Example values** (with $\kappa_{\text{var,min}} = 10^{-6}$, $\varepsilon_{\text{std}} = 10^{-4}$):
2415: - $\sigma'_{\min} \approx 3.16 \times 10^{-4}$
2416: - $L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} \approx 1581.1$
2417: - $L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} \approx 2.50 \times 10^{10}$
